name: Grand Theft Auto V
description:
Rockstar Game Launcher may fail to launch on the first try after the installation. Try it a few times until it works and you can run the game.
On first launch, resolution may be a bit borked. Switch game to borderless windowed mode in settings to workaround that.
notes: * Limiting your FPS to 60 and enabling V-Sync inside of the game, will solve stuttering problems in most cases.
content:
game:
  appid: 271590
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: arial
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  esync: false
  overrides:
    winedbg.exe: d
  version: lutris-rockstar-4.16-x86_64
